feels.name: Indignation
feels.quote: his eyes seemed bursting from their spheres, he swelled to twice his natural dimensions, and, raising himself on his tiptoes, pronounced, in a strain that emulated thunder

causedBy.name: Feeling affronted by the situation with his wife

feels.name: Indignation
feels.quote: his eyes gleamed like lightning, he sprung from his seat with the agility of a grasshopper, and, darting himself out at the door like an arrow from a bow, reappeared in a moment with a long rusty weapon

causedBy.name: Being called out by the French chevalier

hasObject.name: Being called out by the French chevalier

feels.name: Readiness
feels.quote: I am ready to please him in his own way.
